attributes.action: Terrorists in Prison or put in POW camps
attributes.additional_details:
With the latest batch of terrorists being found guilty, Why are we using our valuable prison space,to accommodate these Terrorists, giving them access to rights like visitors, TV Mobile phones etc.

Should it not be better to use on of the Army camps threatened with Closure, turn it into a high security POW, and place these people in there, with no communication with the outside world.

They state they are at WAR with us, so treat them like POW.
